review: Doctor listened my issues patiently and explained  very clearly on why the issues were occurred and what is the remedy and how to avoid in future...  I was completely satisfied with his diagnosis...

Visited for the concern of vit d deficiency. I had gone with vit d screening test result which showed very low level of the vitamin.Doctor was very rude and was not ready to listen to my concerns. will not consult him again
